languages.text: {n}Вам удается проникнуть сквозь защиту когитатора. Его "начинка" довольно проста — программа, заставляющая раз в пять лет активировать передатчик и слать в космос сигнал потерпевшего бедствие корабля.{/n}

{n}You manage to penetrate the cogitator's defences. Its function is rather simple — the program is designed to activate the transmitter once every five years and send out a ship distress signal into space.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам удается проникнуть сквозь защиту когитатора. Его "начинка" довольно проста — программа, заставляющая раз в пять лет активировать передатчик и слать в космос сигнал потерпевшего бедствие корабля.{/n}

{n}You manage to penetrate the cogitator's defences. Its function is rather simple — the program is designed to activate the transmitter once every five years and send out a ship distress signal into space.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你成功地破解了沉思者的防御程序。这台沉思者的功能相当简单，它会每隔五年自动激活一次发射器，向太空中发发射飞船遇险的信号。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You manage to penetrate the cogitator's defences. Its function is rather simple — the program is designed to activate the transmitter once every five years and send out a ship distress signal into space.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你成功地破解了思考器的防御程序。这台思考器的功能相当简单，它会每隔五年自动激活一次发射器，向太空中发发射飞船遇险的信号。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Logras atravesar las defensas del cogitador. Su función es muy sencilla: está programado para activar el transmisor una vez cada cinco años y enviar una señal de socorro al espacio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You manage to penetrate the cogitator's defences. Its function is rather simple — the program is designed to activate the transmitter once every five years and send out a ship distress signal into space.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Logras atravesar las defensas del cogitador. Su función es muy sencilla: está programado para activar el transmisor una vez cada cinco años y enviar una señal de socorro al espacio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたはなんとか考算機の防御を破る。その機能は単純なもので、プログラムは5年に1度発信機を起動し、船の救難信号を宇宙空間に送信するよう設計されている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You manage to penetrate the cogitator's defences. Its function is rather simple — the program is designed to activate the transmitter once every five years and send out a ship distress signal into space.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはなんとか考算機の防御を破る。その機能は単純なもので、プログラムは5年に1度発信機を起動し、船の救難信号を宇宙空間に送信するよう設計されている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es gelingt dir, die Abwehrmechanismen des Cogitators zu überwinden. Seine Funktion ist ziemlich einfach – das Programm aktiviert den Transmitter alle fünf Jahre und sendet ein Schiffsnotsignal in den Weltraum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You manage to penetrate the cogitator's defences. Its function is rather simple — the program is designed to activate the transmitter once every five years and send out a ship distress signal into space.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es gelingt dir, die Abwehrmechanismen des Cogitators zu überwinden. Seine Funktion ist ziemlich einfach – das Programm aktiviert den Transmitter alle fünf Jahre und sendet ein Schiffsnotsignal in den Weltraum.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous parvenez à percer les défenses du cogitateur. Sa fonction est assez simple : le programme est conçu pour activer le transmetteur tous les cinq ans et envoyer un signal de détresse dans l'espace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You manage to penetrate the cogitator's defences. Its function is rather simple — the program is designed to activate the transmitter once every five years and send out a ship distress signal into space.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous parvenez à percer les défenses du cogitateur. Sa fonction est assez simple : le programme est conçu pour activer le transmetteur tous les cinq ans et envoyer un signal de détresse dans l'espace.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kavramsayarın savunmasını aşmayı başarıyorsun. Epey basit bir işlevi var: Program, beş yılda bir vericiyi çalıştırıp uzaya gemi imdat çağrısı yaymak üzere tasarlanmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You manage to penetrate the cogitator's defences. Its function is rather simple — the program is designed to activate the transmitter once every five years and send out a ship distress signal into space.{/n}
